p: The chemicals utilized during research work were acquired from different sources. Acetylsalicylic acid (ASA) was purchased from the local market; ketamine from chemical works of Gedeon Richter Ltd., Budapest, Hungary; and xylazine from Prix Pharmaceutica, Lahore. Hair removing cream Veet was purchased from the local market. All the doses of Cs.Cr crude extract (200, 400, and 800 mg/kg) and acetylsalicylic acid (50 mg/kg) were prepared in normal saline and administered as 4 mL/kg P.O.
